name: Man Helsing
description:
Man Helsing is the adventure of a handsome devil, his sickly sibling and a corrupted kingdom. It's a shame his demon hunting skills are so rusty or he'd set everything straight in a minute, he would indeed! Oh well, he'll have to try his best.

If you own Pico-8 you can download the cartridge to play and edit the game! (fyi: Pico-8 does not support saves from the web player right now.)

// This game is far from complete. If you'd like to see it taken further, send me a message! //

To control: ZX or CV for whip and item menu. arrow keys.to move. start screen says "any button" but you need to press Z or C.
